message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. I believe it could be a valuable asset to you. Let's discuss a fair price. My initial offer is $200 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. To bring us closer together, I would like to counterpropose a price of $175 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $160 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I value your interest in our product. In light of our previous discussions, I would like to counteroffer at $165 for the product. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground, Alice. Based on my budget and considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $160 for the product.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I respect your decision and am willing to meet you halfway. Therefore, I propose a final counteroffer of $162 for the product. I hope this satisfies both our needs.
